DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the bioavailability, safety, and tolerability of a modified-release formulation of PF-05180999 relative to an immediate-release formulation in healthy adult subjects. Two doses of the modified-release formulation and one dose of the immediate-release formulation will be evaluated under fasted conditions. One dose of the modified-release formulation will also be evaluated in the presence of food.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Relative Bioavailability of a Modified-Release Formulation of PF-05180999
DOC.criteria: Male or female of nonchildbearing potential Evidence of clinicallysignificant medical illness, history of seizures, any condition possibly affecting drug absorption
DOC.keyword: Schizophrenia and Disorders with Psychotic Features
